hanzi-su-wiki:
訂

Значения

Исправлять

Мнемоника

Сказать 言 слово, как гвоздь 丁 вбить. Отвечать за каждое слово, договориться. Корректировать, т.е. сверять сказанное.

Варианты

订
purpleculture_pinyin:
dìng
to agree; to conclude; to draw up; to subscribe to (a newspaper etc); to order
Соглашаться; заключить; оформить; подписаться (газета и т. д.); заказать
rtega_mnemonic:
訂訂RS
订订		draw up agreement, arrange, edit, collate, revise, correct
  • robust men 丁 speak 言 to each other ending in an agreement after many revisions and corrections
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 订)
Pictophonetic: 丁 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
訂單 [ dìng dān ]: (purchase) order
訂閱 [ dìng yuè ]: subscription; to subscribe to
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right

    • 丁 [ dīng ] male adult; robust, vigorous; 4th heavenly stem
heisig_chinese_memo: Correct them until you have all the words in the online form nailed down correct. Then you can finalize it and place an order.
heisig_constituent: revise, say, words, keitai, mouth, street, nail, spike
heisig_story: After completing the first draft, you revise it by nailing down your words and "hammering" them into shape.
koohiiStory1: Revise, revise and revise until you have all the words nailed down.
koohiiStory2: Remember how Martin Luther revised the words of the catholic church and nailed his 95 Theses at the door of the church in Wittenberg?
jp_example_words:
改訂(かいてい): revision
訂正(ていせい): correction, revision
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: What you say on the street needs to be revised. Your words need to be polished, you can't publish improv. Revise your street word inspiration before you share it again.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Think about all the stupid things you said on the streets today. Do you want those exact phrases, mistakes, and mouth sounds following you around forever? Revise it before you write it down!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You want to revise the song you wrote about tater (てい) tots at lunch today. But it needs a lot of revising.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
"Tater tots, tater tots, tater tots, man.
Bake me a tater tot as fast as you banana."
Well that's bad. Better revise this so it rhymes.
"Tater tots, tater tots, tater tots, man.
Bake me a tater tot as fast as you want."
Nope, still bad. Revise!
"Tater tots, tater tots, tater tots, man.
Bake me a tater tot as fast as you clam."
Yes. It's gold.
Ru_trainchinese:

dìng: (глаг) бронировать (места и т.д.), заказывать, подписываться на (газету и т.д.)
dìng: (глаг) составлять; судить о; исправлять
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you take a block (丁) of words (言) and revise them
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This is the restaurant street.  Just go into any shop and you can start to place an order with your words.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " yan " to " ding " sound. The original meaning is evaluation and evaluation. "Shuowen": "Revision, fair discussion. Congyan, Dingsheng." Such as "Lunheng. Case Book: "The two blades are cut apart, the sharpness and the dullness are knowledge; the two theories are the same, the right or wrong is the view." "Liu Zi. "Examination of Names": "Speaking is based on deduction, and reasoning is the foundation of words; the name is fixed, and reality is the source of the name."

" Order " means correction or modification. Such as "Song Book. "Li Zhiyi": "His texts are clear and righteous. They are invented, or not contained in Zuo Shi and Gong Yang, but they are also fully revised. Because the three "Biography" parallels the previous generations, generalists cannot Orphaned." "Song History. "Bonji of Gaozong": "Bingshen, to re-edit the Shenzong actual record to obtain the wrong, ordered the History Museum to re-examine."

" Order " means to make or agree. Such as "Literature Pass Test. Service examination. The First of the Civil Service of the Township Party Edition: "According to the most important family since the Wei and Jin Dynasties, the public will determine elections based on this, and the private will use this to determine marriage." "The Scholars" Chapter 46: "Fool cousin Yu Liang, please Yu Dabiao Mr. brother is teaching the children in the dormitory, the annual gold repair is forty taels, and the festival ceremony is outside. Here is the order."

" Order " also means to follow suit. Such as "New Tang Book. "Legend of Li Gan": "Xia Yiyu, the Han Dynasty is Gaodi, and I regard the god Yao as the ancestor, so what is wrong with Yi?

" Order " means stapling, binding. For example, Chapter 21 of "The Strange Situation I've Witnessed in Twenty Years": "I saw many books listed in his room, some of them were wrapped, some were not wrapped, and some were not bound." "Manuscript of Qing History. "De Zong Benji": "Wu Chen, set up a survey of the political hall, choose the political and law of the country to govern the system of China, consider the profit and loss, compile a book, and make a decision based on the purpose."
humanum_short_description_en: From " yan " to " ding " sound. The original meaning is evaluation and evaluation.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「丁」聲。本義是評議、評定。《說文》：「訂，平議也。从言，丁聲。」如《論衡．案書》：「兩刃相割，利鈍乃知；二論相訂，是非乃見。」《劉子．審名》：「言以繹理，理為言本；名以訂實，實為名源。」

　　「訂」表示改正、修改。如《宋書．禮志一》：「其書文清義約，諸所發明，或是《左氏》、《公羊》所不載，亦足有所訂正，是以三《傳》並行於先代，通才未能孤廢。」《宋史．高宗本紀》：「丙申，以重修神宗實錄去取未當，命史館復加考訂。」

　　「訂」表示訂立、約定。如《文獻通考．職役考．歷代鄉黨版籍職役一》：「按魏晉以來最重世族，公家以此定選舉，私門以此訂婚姻。」《儒林外史》第46回：「愚表弟虞梁，敬請余大表兄先生在舍教訓小兒，每年修金四十兩，節禮在外。此訂。」

　　「訂」還表示效法。如《新唐書．黎幹傳》：「夏以禹，漢以高帝，我以神堯為始祖，訂夏法漢，於義何嫌？」

　　「訂」表示釘裝、裝訂。如《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第21回：「只見他那屋裏羅列着許多書，也有包好的，也有未曾包好的，還有不曾裝訂的。」《清史稿．德宗本紀》：「戊辰，置考察政治館，擇各國政法宜於中國治體者，斟酌損益，纂訂成書，取旨裁定。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「丁」聲。本義是評議、評定。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
訂 (Simplified: 订)
Pinyin: dìng
English Definition: to agree; to conclude; to draw up; to subscribe to (a newspaper etc); to order
Total strokes: 9; Radical: 言
Pictophonetic: 丁 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 丁 [ dīng ] male adult; robust, vigorous; 4th heavenly stem
Example Words:
訂單 [ dìng dān ]: (purchase) order
訂閱 [ dìng yuè ]: subscription; to subscribe to
More: 訂* | *訂 | *訂*

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 丁 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 丁 [ dīng ] male adult; robust, vigorous; 4th heavenly stem
①改正，修改：訂正。考訂。校(jiào)訂。修訂。
②約定，立(契約)：訂立。訂購。訂約。
③用線、鐵絲、書釘把書頁、紙張連在一起：裝訂。
④制定：訂計劃。
⑤評議：“兩刃相割，利鈍乃知；二論相訂，是非乃見”。

訂閱 [ dìng yuè ]: subscription; to subscribe to

改訂(かいてい): revision
訂正(ていせい): correction, revision

從「 言 」，「 丁 」聲。本義是評議、評定。《說文》：「訂，平議也。从言，丁聲。」如《論衡．案書》：「兩刃相割，利鈍乃知；二論相訂，是非乃見。」《劉子．審名》：「言以繹理，理為言本；名以訂實，實為名源。」 「 訂 」表示改正、修改。如《宋書．禮志一》：「其書文清義約，諸所發明，或是《左氏》、《公羊》所不載，亦足有所訂正，是以三《傳》並行於先代，通才未能孤廢。」《宋史．高宗本紀》：「丙申，以重修神宗實錄去取未當，命史館復加考訂。」 「 訂 」表示訂立、約定。如《文獻通考．職役考．歷代鄉黨版籍職役一》：「按魏晉以來最重世族，公家以此定選舉，私門以此訂婚姻。」《儒林外史》第46回：「愚表弟虞梁，敬請余大表兄先生在舍教訓小兒，每年修金四十兩，節禮在外。此訂。」 「 訂 」還表示效法。如《新唐書．黎幹傳》：「夏以禹，漢以高帝，我以神堯為始祖，訂夏法漢，於義何嫌？」 「 訂 」表示釘裝、裝訂。如《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第21回：「只見他那屋裏羅列着許多書，也有包好的，也有未曾包好的，還有不曾裝訂的。」《清史稿．德宗本紀》：「戊辰，置考察政治館，擇各國政法宜於中國治體者，斟酌損益，纂訂成書，取旨裁定。」
From " yan" to " ding" sound. The original meaning is evaluation and evaluation. "Shuowen": "Revision, fair discussion. Congyan, Dingsheng." Such as "Lunheng. Case Book: "The two blades are cut apart, the sharpness and the dullness are knowledge; the two theories are the same, the right or wrong is the view." "Liu Zi. "Examination of Names": "Speaking is based on deduction, and reasoning is the foundation of words; the name is fixed, and reality is the source of the name." " Order" means correction or modification. Such as "Song Book. "Li Zhiyi": "His texts are clear and righteous. They are invented, or not contained in Zuo Shi and Gong Yang, but they are also fully revised. Because the three "Biography" parallels the previous generations, generalists cannot Orphaned." "Song History. "Bonji of Gaozong": "Bingshen, to re-edit the Shenzong actual record to obtain the wrong, ordered the History Museum to re-examine." " Order" means to make or agree. Such as "Literature Pass Test. Service examination. The First of the Civil Service of the Township Party Edition: "According to the most important family since the Wei and Jin Dynasties, the public will determine elections based on this, and the private will use this to determine marriage." "The Scholars" Chapter 46: "Fool cousin Yu Liang, please Yu Dabiao Mr. brother is teaching the children in the dormitory, the annual gold repair is forty taels, and the festival ceremony is outside. Here is the order." " Order" also means to follow suit. Such as "New Tang Book. "Legend of Li Gan": "Xia Yiyu, the Han Dynasty is Gaodi, and I regard the god Yao as the ancestor, so what is wrong with Yi? " Order" means stapling, binding. dìng
вм. 订
Radicals: 言, 丁  (say, street)
Meaning Mnemonic
What you say on the street needs to be revised. Your words need to be polished, you can't publish improv. Revise your street word inspiration before you share it again.
Think about all the stupid things you said on the streets today. Do you want those exact phrases, mistakes, and mouth sounds following you around forever? Revise it before you write it down!
Reading Mnemonic
You want to revise the song you wrote about tater (てい) tots at lunch today. But it needs a lot of revising.
"Tater tots, tater tots, tater tots, man.
Bake me a tater tot as fast as you banana."
Well that's bad. Better revise this so it rhymes.
"Tater tots, tater tots, tater tots, man.
Bake me a tater tot as fast as you want."
Nope, still bad. Revise!
"Tater tots, tater tots, tater tots, man.
Bake me a tater tot as fast as you clam."
Yes. It's gold.
